alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; San Juan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 26 at 2:25AM PST until February 27 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON PST TODAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south to southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south to southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Juan County and Admiralty Inlet Area. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from noon today to 6 PM PST this evening. For the first Wind Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to noon PST today. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; San Juan County
